Summary: A glowing blue ball of light very quickly passed o
divs: sighting detailsas i was on my break from work, i was driving around the park finishing mycigarette. as i drove up a short, but steep hill i was looking at some fairlylow-lying clouds when all of the sudden a large ball of glowing blue\green lightpierced through the bottom of the clouds going very, very fast almost directlyover me. it passed back into the clouds not even a second after it appeared. itmad no sound that i could hear, but visually the glow of the craft appeared tohum with light and energy. i said holy24hit to my self and came to a stop right on this hill. it didnt even occur tome to follow it for a second or two. my first gut reaction was that it might ofbeen a crashing plane, but it was just the angle i was at on the hill. it wasactually heading in a strait line due south-west. my three other friends werenorth of town in the country and only saw the light through the clouds in thesouth-western horizon. all of them agree that it moved across the sky fasterthat anything theyve seen. i was surprised to learn that they saw the samething! im going to encourage them to report it also, which is why i left themanonomys.
